english: Sir, there's no sign of him.
I couldn't bring my brother to you.
...the families of the boy in the room...

text: …gerçeği görmeni ve bizimle olmanı istiyorum Ertuğrul
english: I want you to see the truth and be with us, Ertugrul.
♪ To be with us ♪ ♪ Walk with us ♪
I want you to win with us.

text: Doğduğum günden beri Cengiz Han’ın ordularıyla savaşırız
english: From the day I was born we have fought Genghis Khan's armies
All my loved ones died one by one

text: Buna ağabeyim Sungur Tekin de dâhil

english: Now you can tell me about friendship.

text: Ben yaşadığım sürece bu dostluk asla olmayacak
english: As long as I live, this friendship will never happen.

text: Hayatımda gördüğüm en iyi en zeki savaşçılardan biri
english: He's one of the best smart fighters I've ever seen in my life.

text: Bizimle bir olarak bunu bir kez daha kanıtladı
english: He's proved it once again as one with us.

text: Ne oldu? Tuğtekin ne diyor babasının sözlerine?
english: What did Tugtekin say to his father's words?

text: O da babasıyla aynı fikirdedir, ana
english: He agrees with his father, mother.
Now we'll learn about them in the naive.

text: Benim sözüme Kayı Obasında itibar edilmez ana
english: My word is not to be respected in the Kayı Oband.

text: Vakti zamanında Halep’e gitmeyelim dedim Dinlemediniz
english: In time, I said not to go to Aleppo. You didn't listen.
There's a disaster that hasn't happened to us.

text: Tam huzura erdik derken yine yollara düştük
english: Just when we're at peace, we're on our way again.

text: Ama bundan sonra sözümü dinleteceğim, ana
english: But from now on, I'll make you listen to me, Mother.
Item, before we finish the Chinese expedition...

text: …Sultan Alaeddin bu çoban sürüsünü de peşine takıp, üzerinize gelirse…
english: ...Sultan Alaeddin will hunt down this flock of shepherds and come after you...
...this time you'll be the one who gets run over.

text: Hayatlarının en zor kışını yaşatacağım onlara
english: I'll give them the hardest winter of their lives

text: Analarının rahminde yaşar gibi çadırlarına kapanıp…
english: Like living in the womb of their mothers.
...they'll see that they can't live in peace.
It will be gathered in my tent.

text: Lakin, her iki boy da kendi meselelerini
english: But both lengths have their own issues
They'll decide on their own progeny.
Otherwise you can't do it, sir.
I'd like my son to have Tugtekin.

text: kardeşim Ertuğrul'un intikamını alma kararı çıkmıştır
english: My brother has decided to avenge Ertugrul's death.
Those in favor of this mission

text: Ertuğrul'un öcünü almak için yola çıkacaklar
english: They'll be on their way to avenge Ertugrul's death.

text: İçimden bir ses Ertuğrul ölmedi der, ana
english: Something tells me Ertugrul isn't dead, Mother.

text: Sanki kısa vakitte bize kavuşacak gibidir
english: It's like he's gonna be with us in no time.
It's like he's not gonna leave his kid without a father.
Two obas have decided to take revenge

text: Gündoğdu Bey'imin dediği gibi araziye çıkıp pusu attık Hayme Ana
english: As Mr. Gündüz said, we went out into the field and ambushed Hayme Ana.

text: Obanın geliş gidişini gözetleyen bir Moğol gördük
english: We saw a Mongol watching the Oban come and go.

text: Ben Sadettin Köpek ile görüşmeye gidiyorum
english: I'm going to see Saditin Dog.
The one who goes hunting is the one who hunts.

text: İki kişi keşif için yola çıksın
english: Two men on their way to recon.
Let them be quick and resourceful

text: Bu keferelerin nereden çıkacağı belli olmaz
english: You never know where these shrouds will come from.
Let's not get caught off guard
Bring me the head of Gündüz and Tuğtekin
No one gets out of here alive.

text: Kendini bu kadar yormamalısın Halime Sultan
english: You shouldn't tire yourself out, Halima Sultan.
It's good to work, Aytolun Hatun
It's easier to wait for the melt like this.

text: Tuğtekin ve Gündoğdu erinin intikamını alacaklar
english: Tuğtekin and Gündüz will avenge the soldier
Ertuğrul, what kind of a hero was he?
From the bottom of my heart
Ertugrul was the hope of our Oba, Aytolun Hatun

text: Kayıları ur gibi saran ihanetin içinden
english: Through the betrayal that surrounds the apricots
It was Ertugrul who pulled us all out.

text: Ablanın da bu ihanetin bir parçası olduğunu sonra da tövbe ettiğini duydum
english: I heard your sister was a part of the betrayal and then she repented.
I'm really sorry about what happened.
May God give you all patience.
I know people like you very well.

text: Tatlı dilinizle nasıl zehir taşıdığınızı iyi bilirim
english: I know how you carry poison with your sweet tongue.

text: Geçmişte işlediğin günahlar sana çok büyük hayat tecrübeleri kazandırmış, Selcan
english: Your past sins have given you great experience of life, Selcan.

text: bilhassa kardeşim Gökçe ile Halime'den uzak durasın Aytolun
english: Especially if you stay away from my brother Gökçe and Halima, Aytolun

text: Benim içimde kötü bir his var
english: I have a bad feeling about this.
The blood won't stop in the vein, sir.
Breathing in the blood in the veins.

text: Abdurrahman'la Hamza da yok hâlâ ortada
english: There's still no Abdurrahman or Hamza.
Find me that son of a bitch!
Find him or I'll kill you all!
We've got to run, my lad.
Hold on, for God's sake, hold on.
Run to that path over there!

text: İçimizden biri bizi tuzağa düşürdü abi
english: One of us set us up, man.
What are you talking about, Tugtekin?

text: Pusunun içinde pusuya düşürmeler Hepsi bir tuzaktı
english: The ambushes in the ambush, it was all a trap.

text: Haini en yakındaki Alplerin de arasan iyi olur abi
english: You'd better call the nearest Alps.

text: Şimdi burada senin yanında olmayan Alpler
english: The Alps that are not here with you now.

text: Benimkilerin yarısı öldü ya da vuruldu
english: Half my people are dead or shot.
Hamza, take good care of this dog.
We need to get him to talk.

text: Ben sana o Moğol'un başından ayrılmayacaksın demedim mi?
english: Didn't I tell you not to leave that Mongol?

text: Obanın geliş gidişini gözetleyen bir Moğol gördük
english: We saw a Mongol watching the Oban come and go.

text: Ölmeden evvel Noyan'ın yarın yola çıkacağını söyledi
english: He said Noyan was leaving tomorrow before he died.
You're gonna die because of me.

text: Ha gayret. İki adım daha attın mı
english: Come on, you take two more steps.
The tracks are heading this way.
He's been missing for three days, sir.
Then he took care of her.
You've put up with these demons, my lad.
Dad, what are you doing here?

text: şehit olmaktan başka bir amacım yok oğlum
english: I have no purpose but to be a martyr, my son.

text: Kışı birlikte geçirme kararı herkese güven verdi, Hayme
english: The decision to spend the winter together gave everyone confidence, Hayme
It's dawn and I think of Tugtekin
I'm afraid they'll do something wrong.
The demon they're up against is not to be underestimated.
Our children are the future of both obans.
As soon as the sun's up on the board, God willing.

text: Bu pusuyu kim kurdu öğrenmemiz icap eder, dur
english: We need to find out who set this ambush, stop.

text: Lakin bu hiç kolay olmayacak abi

english: Why do you say that, Hayme?
To the barracks of two obans together
Who do you think will be the most angry?

text: dışarıdan da kaşımak için her şeyi yapacak
english: He'll do anything to scratch it from the outside.
He won't let us breathe from the outside.
Hang in there, man. You're gonna be okay.

text: Burada olanlardan biri bize ihanet etti
english: One of the people who was here betrayed us.
He ratted us out to Noyan.
I'm willing to risk being ambushed.

text: kim böyle bir şeyi yapar ki?
english: Who would do such a thing?

text: Belki de hain şu an burada değildir
english: Maybe the traitor isn't here right now.

text: Hamza ile Abdurrahman keşfe çıkmışlardı Hâlâ gelmediler
english: Hamza and Abdurrahman were exploring. They still haven't arrived.
They were so eager to go ahead.

text: Belli ki burada tuzak olduğunu biliyorlardı
english: They obviously knew there was a trap here.

text: Senin ağzın deve işkembesinden beter olmuş
english: Your mouth is worse than a camel's tripe.

text: Temiz kelam çıkmaz mı senin ağzından?
english: Don't you ever say anything clean?
Or else I'd know what to do to you.
What the fuck are you gonna do?
Tugtekin is a brave young man
When I look at her, I see your youth.

text: Ama Ertuğrul'un eski, fevri haline çok benziyor
english: But it's very similar to Ertugrul's old impulsive state.

text: Ertuğrul, savaş sanatını düşmanlarının en hasının topraklarında öğrenmişti
english: Ertugrul learned the art of war in the land of the most wicked of his enemies.
His politics in Aleppo's relations with the Ayyubis
And in his struggle with the Templars
He saw the subtleties of the art of war.

text: En önemlisi; düşmanını tanımanın erdemini öğrenmişti
english: Most importantly, he learned the virtue of knowing his enemy.

text: Tuğtekin henüz bu tecrübelerden çok uzak abi
english: Tugtekin is far away from these experiences.

text: Moğollarla savaş da Tuğtekin'i pişirdi Hayme
english: The battle with the Mongols made Tuğtekin Hayme
Don't worry, we'll get through it all.

text: Nihayetinde bu iş hiç kolay olmayacak abi
english: After all, it won't be easy.

text: Önden keşif için yolladınız ya beyim
english: You sent him to scout ahead, sir.
What does this adam say, sir?

text: Beyim, sen ne dediğini bilir misin?
english: Sir, do you know what you're saying?
Stay out of this, Crazy Iron.
They're our lives, our lungs, my lord.
He must find a way to carry you.

text: İkisinin de birbirinden yiğit Alpleri var
İşte benim en büyük korkum bu abi

english: I didn't order anything like that.
Your command is to obey, and to obey.
Which one of you sold us to Noyan?

text: Sana verecek cevabım yok benim Çağır beyimi gelsin. Çağır!
english: I don't have any answers for you.

text: Aptal herif, beyin de sana itimat etmez, görmez misin ha?
english: Idiot, don't you see the brain doesn't trust you?
You left the Mongol I brought to Oba alone.

text: Deli Demir'in acısıyla onu öldürmesine sebep oldun. Niye?
english: You got Mad Iron to kill him with his pain.
Because to stop him from talking
You can't tell me I've been a traitor.

text: Niye? Yoksa efendin Noyan'a mı söylersin ha?
english: Why don't you tell your master Noyan?

text: Bu çatışmayı engellemek için tedbir almak gerekir
english: We must take precautions to prevent this conflict.

text: Abi, böyle bir çatışmada yerle yeksan olmamız için Noyan'a bile gerek kalmaz
english: Brother, we don't even need Noyan to take us down in a fight like this.

text: Biz kendi kendimize hallederiz o işi
english: We'll take care of it ourselves.

text: Bu ikisinin infaz edilmesini istiyorum abi
english: I want these two executed, brother.

text: Beyim, sakın bu densizin dediğini yapma
english: Sir, don't you dare do what this bastard says.
Abdurrahman has been entrusted to us by Solomon Shah

text: Hamza da sizin en yiğit Alpiniz
english: And Hamza is your bravest Alpine.

text: Nice cenkte sizin adınıza kelle koltukta savaştı
english: He fought for you in many battles.

text: Eğer böyle bir şey yaparsanız vebali ağır olur
english: If you do such a thing, the plague will be severe.

text: Şu hale bak. Ne hale geldi boya

english: I told you, woman, you didn't listen to me.

text: Bırak bırak. Eksik olsun senin yardımın Git başımdan. Ben kendim yaparım
english: Let go, I'm sorry, it's your help, go away, I'll do it myself.

text: Aytolun Hanım, yani şu hale bakın
english: Lady Aytolun, I mean look at this.

text: Bir kazan boyayı berbat etti Yani bunlar bize yardım
english: A boiler screwed up the paint, so that's helping us.

text: etmeye mi geldi başımıza bela olmaya mı belli değil
english: I don't know if he's here or if he's coming to trouble us.

text: Yavaş yavaş karıştır dedim, Aytolun Hanım Dinlemedi beni
english: I said stir it slowly, Aytolun Haným didn't listen to me.
She's no better than a goat.

text: O senin lafını değil, sen onun lafını dinleyeceksin
english: It's not your word, it's yours to listen to.

text: Burada kim ev sahibi, kim misafir unutmayacaksın
english: You won't forget who's the host here and who's the guest.
If you forget, I'll remind you.

text: Kim olduklarını, nereden geldiklerini hatırlatırım Selcan
english: Let me remind you who they are, where they came from, Selcan.

text: Her şeyden önce, bir sığıntı olduklarını
english: First of all, they're a refuge

text: Acımızdan ölürüz de bunlara hizmet etmeyiz
english: We die of our pain and we don't serve them.

text: Korkut Bey'im olmasaydı kurda kuşa yem olurdunuz
english: If it weren't for Mr. Scare, you'd be eaten by a wolf.

text: Burada, benim kilimhanemde kimse benim kadınlarıma
english: Here, in my rug, no one's ever told my women

text: Biz Hayme Ana'mızdan ne gördüysek onu yaparız, Aytolun Hanım
english: We do what we see from our Mother Hayme, Mrs. Aytolun.

text: İki elimiz kanda olsa da acımızdan ölsek de
english: Whether we're both in blood or dying of pain
He wants us to do our job right.

text: Boya kazanlarındaki otlar, rengini tez versin diye altına odunu basarsanız
english: If you put wood under it so that the herbs in the paint boilers will give its color faster

text: Tuttursanız da kilim dokununca rengi kalıcı olmaz
english: And even if you do, the rug won't be permanent when you touch it.
You won't find customers in the market.
After all, we're the Kai women.

text: işimizi eğri büğrü yapmaktansa yapmamayı tercih ederiz
english: We'd rather not do our job than make it crooked.
Which is why you should think about it.

text: Beyine de sor, kararınızı bize deyin
english: Ask the brain, tell us your decision
If you want, we'll come and do it right.

text: İsterseniz de biz olmadan bildiğiniz gibi işinizi yaparsınız
english: If you want to, you can do your job without us.
I'm going to execute them, brother.
I can't bring trouble to Obama.

text: Biz de seni adam sandık be

text: Biz de seni, beyimizin intikamını alacak yiğit sandık ama sen
english: We thought you were brave enough to avenge our master's death, but you

text: korkakmışsın. Hem korkak hem de aptal
english: You're a coward, a coward and a fool.
We draw swords at each other?

text: Bu nasıl Alplik? Bu nasıl cenk etmek?

english: In the name of God, stop!
We need to consolidate our relationship, Hayme
Even in the midst of battle

text: düğünlerle, toylarla birbirimize olan güveni arttırmak gerekir
english: We need to build trust in each other with weddings, immatures.

text: Bunun için de en iyisi birbirimizden kız alıp vermek
english: And for that, it's best if we give each other girls.

text: Senin de evlenme vaktin geldi Gökçe
english: It's time for you to get married, too, Gökçe.

text: Halime gibi dul kalmam için mi?
english: To become a widow like Halima?

text: Lakin Ertuğrul'un ardında bıraktığı dullardan biri gibi davranman
english: But pretending to be one of the widows Ertugrul left behind

text: Bebesi olmayacak, çöl kadar kuru bir kadın olduğumu ne çabuk unuttun abla
english: How quickly did you forget that I'm a woman as dry as a desert without a baby?
Look, I've come back to you, too.

text: Kıraç, uğursuz bir kız kurusu gibi yaşamaya mahkum oldum
english: I've been condemned to live like a barren, ill-fated old maid.

text: Hangi erkek alır beni abla? Hadi söyle
Acılarımızı içimize gömüp yolumuza devam etmeliyiz
english: We must bury our sorrows and move on.
Life will show us its beauty

text: Sakın ola ki o güzel gözlerini yere dikip, toprağa gömmeyesin
english: So that you may not set your beautiful eyes on the ground and bury them in the ground.

text: Ertuğrul nasıl o obanın umuduysa, senin gibi güzel ve becerikli kızlar
english: Just as Ertugrul is the hope of that oban, beautiful and resourceful girls like you
How many Ertuğrül will bring our obama

text: Sana o kadar ihtiyacım var ki
Beni bu fani dünyada yalnız bırakıp gittin
english: You left me alone in this mortal world

text: Bu kadar yükün altından ben nasıl kalkacağım?
english: How am I supposed to handle all this weight?

text: Gökçe hakkında bilip de bana demediğin ne var Eygiş?
english: What do you know about Sky and not me, Eygish?
It's going to be hard this winter, Eygish.

text: Artuk Bey'le huzur içinde işini gücünü yapmak istersen
english: If you want to do your job in peace with Mr. Artuk

text: Gökçe hakkında bilip de demediğin ne var?
english: What don't you know about the sky?
Tell me, who is in the heart of Gökçe?
If you don't feel sorry for yourself, feel sorry for your stomach.
It's in the hands of Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Bir şey yapmasam olmaz. Ertuğrul'um dönene kadar durmayacağım
english: I won't stop until my Ertugrul returns.
Or I'll lose my mind Selcan

text: Bayır Bucak Türkmenlerinden Geyikli'nin fakirhanesine hoş geldin yiğidim
english: Welcome to Deerli's humble abode of the Bayur Bucak Turkmen

text: Obamızın güvenliği her şeyden önde gelir abi
english: The safety of our Obama comes first, brother.

text: Bu ikisini obaya götüremeyiz Bedeli çok ağır olur
english: We can't take these two to the oba. The price is too high.

text: Toyda karar verme yetkisi sana verildi
english: You've been given the authority to decide, Toyda.
Of course, I respect your decisions.

text: Lakin onları infaz etmek çok ağır bir karar olur
english: But it would be a very heavy decision to execute them.

text: Ben derim ki onları sürgün edelim

english: What about the Alps of Ertugrul?
I see they've violated your reputation.

text: Lakin onlar da bizim canımız, kanımızdır
english: But they are our lives, our blood

text: Hem Hayme Ana da onları çok sever
O zaman mesele çözülene kadar onlar da sürgün edilsin
english: Then let them be banished until the matter is resolved.

text: Alpbaşının emrine karşı çıktılar abi İsyana kalktılar
english: They defied the order of the Alps. They tried to rebel.
What the hell are they still talking about?

text: Hamza'yla Abdurrahman'ın infaz edilmesine izin vermez
english: He won't let Hamza and Abdurrahman be executed.

text: Tuğtekin kim ki? Bizim kendi toyumuz yok mu?
english: Don't we have our own tofu?
Tugtekin is the head of all of us here.

text: Onun burada aldığı kararlar toyda bile sorgulanamaz
english: His decisions here can't be questioned even in the naive.
We're not here for a ride.
We're here to fight the gentlemen's decision.

text: Kazandık ama ihanete uğradık Onca şehit verdik
english: We've won, but we've been betrayed We've given so many martyrs
Mr. Gündüz has a hard time.

text: onlarla birlikte siz de sürgün edileceksiniz
english: You will be banished along with them.

text: Kış bitip de savaşana kadar obaya dönmeyeceksiniz
english: You're not going back to the room until winter's over and we're fighting.
You will take care of Hamza and Abdurrahman
That's the decision made about you.

text: onun gözünde Ertuğrul'un baş belası Alpleriyiz biz
english: In his eyes, we're Ertugrul's pain in the ass Alps.

Shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit, shit.

text: Ertuğrul'un kaçtığı yetmez gibi pusu da başarısız oldu
english: Not only did Ertugrul escape, but the ambush failed.

text: Eğer Börtlü'yü konuştururlarsa Kocabaş açığa çıkar. Bu daha da kötü
english: If they get Börtlü to talk, Big Head will be exposed.

text: Ya da Kocabaş bir yolunu bulup Börtlü'yü öldürmeli
english: Or Big Boy's got to figure out a way to kill Burrito.
Noyan, the price of this incompetence
He'll make you pay very hard.
Don't worry about it, Iron Master.

text: Yaşayan tek evlatlarımsınız. Kurban olayım birbirinize göz kulak olun
english: You're my only living children, so look after each other.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im bu densizliği yapmazdı, Gündoğdu Bey'im
english: Mr. Ertugrul wouldn't do such a thing, Mr. Gündüz.

text: Sana helal edecek hakkımız yoktur üzerimizde
english: We have no right to give you permission.
It's not you, it's the alpine.

text: Bu durum benim de canımı yakar Deli Demir
english: This is gonna hurt me, too, Crazy Iron.
But there was no other way

text: Şu Börtlü denilen adamı ne olursa olsun konuşturmam icap eder
english: I'm gonna have to get that guy with the brownies to talk no matter what.

text: Herkesin kalbini kırdıktan sonra gerçekleri öğrenmek
english: To find out the truth after breaking everyone's heart

text: bize huzur verir mi Gündoğdu Bey'im?
english: Will it give us peace, Mr. Gündüz?

text: Obamızı büyük bir dertten kurtardınız beyim
english: You've saved us a great deal of trouble, sir.
That's the only way these lunatics know how to do it.

text: Merak etme. Seni buradan kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulacağım
english: Don't worry, I'll find a way to get you out of here.
Don't you dare open your mouth.
Love, the right to kill you

text: Sonra da seni kendisiyle diriltmesi değil midir ki?
english: Then He will resurrect you with it.
Let's take him to the tent.
Eygis told me he was bleeding.

text: Şimdi durumu iyi, lakin bebek için endişeliyim
english: He's fine now, but I'm worried about the baby.
She couldn't stand all this pain, baby.

text: Şimdi dinlenmesi lazım Hayme Hatun Yoksa
english: She needs rest now, Hayme Hatun.
How can I live without him, Mother?
How can he live without you?
Haven't you done enough to yourself?
You have to live for your baby.

text: Oo, kendine geldin demek ki beyim
english: Oh, you've come to your senses, my lord.

text: Tangut'un çapulcu sürüsü, senin adınla inlettiler koca ormanı
english: Tangut's pack of marauders moaned in your name

text: Geyikli derler bana. Kendimi bildim bileli bu ormandayım
english: I've been in this forest for as long as I can remember.

text: Kalk bakalım. Şundan biraz ye ki
english: Get up and eat some of this.
In the morning you'll be chasing after the Mongol shroud.

text: Bu bitecek yiğidim. Anam ağladı bunu yapana kadar
english: This is going to end, my son.

text: Hem bu biterse sana kırmızı etle kımız vereceğim
english: Besides, if this ends, I'll give you red meat and kiz.
A fresh quim, a sin-free one.
What did Noyan want from you?
I know why you came here from Tebriz.
If he didn't catch someone like you and kill you
Well, with human bears, wolves, birds
I don't know when I'm sleeping with vermin.

text: kulağı keskin, gözleri de şahin gibi oluyor
english: His ears are sharp and his eyes are like hawks.
You obviously didn't give Noyan what he wanted.

text: Senden ne istiyordu? Ona yandaşlık etmeni mi?
english: What did he want you to do, support him?

text: Bundan gayrı attığın her adıma dikkat edeceksin beyim
english: You will take every step you take away from this, my lord.

text: Çünkü bundan gayrı sevdiğin ne varsa
english: 'Cause anything else you love more than that
He's under the threat of Noyan, for all you know.
You are among the chosen servants of Allah.

text: Börtlü denilen iti yakaladık Bir sürü de Moğol biçtik. Sonra ne oldu?
english: We caught a dog called the burgundy, and we mowed a bunch of Mongols, and then what happened?

text: Bu bir zafer mi yoksa hezimet mi?
Üç, beş it öldürüp zafer kazandık diyecekler
english: They'll say three, five Mutts killed and won.

text: Sonra da Kayı Obası'nın Alplerini gözünü kırpmadan harcayacaklar
english: Then they're going to spend the Alps of the Abyssian Obas without blinking a wink.

text: Bundan gayrı Kayı Obası iflah olmaz kardeşler
english: Other than that, brothers and sisters, there's no such thing as the Abyssian Obama.
I know that, I say that.

text: Kardeş, sen ne söylersin Allah'ını seversen ya?
english: Brother, what would you say if you loved God?

text: Ne dediğimi iyi bilirim ben kardeşler
english: I know what I'm talking about, brothers.

text: Süleyman Şah'ım öldü. Ertuğrul Bey'im de
english: My Süleyman Shah is dead, and so is Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Bundan gayrı Kayı Obası'ndan bir halt olmaz
english: Other than that, there's nothing wrong with the Abyssian Obama.
You're angry, you don't know what you're talking about Hamza

text: Ne dediğimi iyi bilirim derim size
english: I'll tell you I know what I'm talking about.

text: Gündoğdu Bey'im, dayısıyla oğlunun kuyruğuna takılıp
english: Mr. Gündüz, he's stuck with his uncle and his son's tail

text: obasını huzurlu topraklara götürme derdine düşecektir
english: He'll be worried about taking his obama to a peaceful land.
Crusade from the east, Mongols from the west
There's no place for us anymore.

text: Ölümüne savaşmak düşer bize derdi Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: It's our duty to fight to the death, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: cenksiz geçen her gün bize nefes almak haramdır
english: It's forbidden for us to breathe every day without war.

text: Ne obama dönmek isterim ne de böyle nefes almak
english: I don't want to go back to my obama, nor do I want to breathe like this.
They took our loved ones away from us.

text: bu şerefsizlerle ölümüne savaşmaktan başka çaremiz yok
english: We have no choice but to fight these bastards to the death.

text: Biz ölene kadar savaşmaya sürgün edildik
english: We're banished to fight until we die.
That's how it's supposed to be known.

text: Allah bize uzun ömür versin de
english: May God give us a long life
Let me lay down the evil head of many

text: Cenksiz yaşamak bundan böyle haramdır bize
english: It's forbidden for us to live without it anymore.
How could you do such a thing?
How could you do such a thing?

text: İhanetlerinin bedelini ödediler Hayme Ana Bunu yapmaya mecburdum
english: They paid for their betrayal, Mother Hayme. I had to do it.

text: Tuğtekin, bu kadar katı olursan kırılman kolay olur
english: Tugtekin, it'll be easy for you to break if you're so strict.
How can you banish the Alps of Ertugrul?

text: Bu kadar kolay mı yiğitlerimi harcamak, ha?
english: Is it that easy to waste my braves, huh?
They gave our enemies a hard time for years.
How could you just throw it away?

text: Ne de olsa obası talan edildi Evladını kaybetti
english: After all, he's been robbed. He's lost his son.
He's in a lot of pain.

text: Noyan’ın en iyi komutanlarından birini yakalayıp getirdiniz
english: You have captured one of Noyan's finest commanders.
You've given them a great deal of destruction.
I'm proud of you, my braves.

text: Şayet Ertuğrul, Süleyman Şah da yaşasalardı…
english: If only Ertuğrul and Sulaiman Shah had lived...

text: Lakin kendi ellerinizle yiğitlerinize kıymışsınız derler
english: But they say you've slaughtered your braves with your own hands.

text: İki obanın birleşmesi hayırlı oldu hatun
english: It's a good thing two obas got together, girl.
With Allah's permission, we were victorious.

text: Elbet bunun bir bedeli olacaktı değil mi?
english: There's bound to be a price to pay, isn't there?

text: Bedeli ilk ödeyenler de kardeşinin Alpleri oldu
english: The first to pay the price was your brother's Alps.

text: Bir vakitler ikimizin de içini kemiren ihtiraslar
english: The passions that once gnawed at both of us

text: bu obayı da esir almıştır Gündoğdu'm
english: He's taken this oba prisoner, too, my sunshine.

text: Bu işin sonu sandığımız kadar iyi olmayacak
english: This isn't going to end as well as we thought.

text: Ertuğrul’un Alplerinden sonra bakalım daha ne bedeller ödemek zorunda kalacağız
english: Let's see what more costs we'll have to pay after the Alps of Ertugrul.

text: Allah’ım onu bana sağ salim getirdin
english: God, you brought him to me safe and sound.
Oh, thank God a thousand times.
Guide him to the right path

text: Tuğtekin Bey’im, bana dökülen kanın hesabını soracağına söz vermiştin
english: Mr. Tuğtekin, you promised me you'd answer for the blood spilled.
I hear you kept your promise.
You'd be lucky to have two.

text: Vakti geldiğinde Noyan’ın kellesini bu obanın ortasına dikeceğim
english: When the time comes, I'll have Noyan's head intersected in the middle of this ob.

text: Bunu da senin için yapacağım Gökçe Hatun
english: I'll do that for you, too, Gökçe Hatun.
I'm going to make her talk.
I'll make him talk, even if I'm out of my humanity.
I'll find out if Abdurrahman and Hamza are guilty
I was talking to my brother.

text: İki obanın birlikte kışlaması hiç kolay olmayacak dediydim
english: I said it wouldn't be easy for two obas to go into the barracks together.

text: Doğru olan da buydu ama ana
english: It's the right thing to do, but it's the mother.
What about the price we pay?

text: Bu kadar kolay harcatamayız yiğitlerimizi Gündoğdu
english: We can't waste our braves so easily.

text: Ana, Abdurrahman’la Hamza suçlu mu, değil mi bilmem
english: Ana, I don't know if Abdurrahman and Hamza are guilty or not.

text: …babamın yadigârı Abdurrahman’ı da Hamza’yı da idam edeceklerdi. İdam!

english: What was I supposed to do?

text: Ne yapardık o zaman? Yine yollara düşerdik
Kimsenin canı yanmadan sürgün kararı aldırdım
english: I've ordered a banishment before anyone gets hurt.

text: Ne olursa olsun Tuğtekin ve Alpleri…
english: No matter what, Tugtekin and the Alps...
...they risked their lives for my brother Ertugrul.
Because of the false intelligence of our Alps...
...they almost put us all to the sword.

text: Biz iki oba kader birliği ettik
…ne de sen Tuğtekin’in emrinde değilsin Gündoğdu

english: I'm not taking orders from anyone.

text: Siz gidin yemeğinizi yiyin Ben içeridekiyle ilgilenirim
english: You guys go eat. I'll take care of what's inside.
Don't worry, I'll get you out of here.
They have to believe you ran away on your own.

text: Yoksa obada birinin Noyan’a haber uçurduğunu anlarlar
english: Or they'll find out that someone in the Oba tipped off Noyan.

text: Merak etme Kocabaş Elini çabuk tut
english: Don't worry, Big Head. Hurry up.

text: Gündoğdu’yla Tuğtekin’in işkencelerinden bir an önce kurtar beni
english: Save me from the torments of the dawn and the Tuğtekin
Run under the tent as soon as you can.
The back of the tent is available to escape.

text: Tuğtekin Bey’im ona göz kulak olmamı istedi
english: Mr. Tuğtekin asked me to take care of him.
You can't get a word out of him without smashing it.
I'm gonna beat the shit out of you.
...you'll pray to God that you don't breathe.

text: Bu işin meşakkatli olacağını hepimiz bilirdik
english: We all knew this was gonna be tough.

text: Bu küçük şeyler tıpkı bir su damlası gibi birikir, birikir…
english: These little things pile up, like a drop of water...

text: Damlaları biriktirmeden hâl yolunu bulmak gerektir
english: You have to find a way without collecting drops.

text: Sel gider, kum kalır Hayme Ana
english: The flood goes and the sand stays Hayme Ana
We don't know anything about these things, Mrs. Aytolun.
We'll finish the goods before winter comes...
...we have to take it and sell it.

text: Vakit hayli az İş ise çoktur
english: There's very little time And there's a lot of work

text: Selcan bundan böyle senin emrinde çalışacak Aytolun
english: Selcan will now work for you, Aytolun.
I talked to the women who quit.

text: Yarın sabah hepsi işinin başında olacak
english: They'll all be at work tomorrow morning.

text: Çok doğru karar vermişsin Hayme Ana
english: You made the right decision, Hayme Ana.
Apricot women are very proud Aytolun
But if you break his pride...

text: …bunca işi tek başına yaparsın Bilmiş ol
english: ...you'll do all this work on your own. You've got to know.

text: Abimin karısının ölümü hepimizi çok sarsmıştı
english: My brother's wife's death rocked us all.
But you kept my brother up.

text: Moğol iki evladını aldı Onun acısını unutturdun
english: The Mongol has taken his two children You have made him forget his pain

text: Eğer bir ve diri olmamızı istiyorsan sana çok iş düşecek Aytolun
english: If you want us to be alive and one, you'll get a lot of work, Aytolun.
I've been waiting for him for days.

text: Alaeddin Keykubat yeni vazife vermiş O yüzden gelemeyecekmiş
english: Alaeddin Keykabat has a new assignment, so he won't be able to make it.
But he's ready to do anything.
He wants to be the new ruler of Anatolia

text: Sana son bir vazife daha vereceğim
english: I'll give you one last task.

text: Bir daha asla söz verip de gelmemezlik etmesin
english: Don't let him promise never to come back.

text: Yoksa bu toprakları mezar yaparım ona
english: Or I'll make this land a grave for him

text: Ee, kuzu var mı, kuzu? Vardır beyim
english: So, do you have any lamb, lamb?

text: Bize kelle başı kuzu getir o zaman Emrin olur beyim
english: Bring us a head of lamb. Then it will be your command, sir.

text: Beylere benden pilav ve ayran ikram edesin
english: Offer the gentlemen rice and buttermilk on me.

text: Lakin biz Alpler kimseden ikram almayız Bilesin
english: But we Alps don't get treats from anyone. You know that.
I bring goods from India, from China to Anatolia
We're the Alps of the Abyssian Obama.
Solomon is the master of the Shah.
How do you know our master?
You're in good hands, my son. Let there be peace.

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

text: Beyim. Senin gibi nice kahramanlar bu tezgâhtan geçti
english: My lord, many heroes like you have passed through this stall.
How many brave men have been beaten in this anvil
If you're out of this hellhole...
The whole world should be afraid of you.
...my love, my obam, my Alps didn't get out of that hellhole?
Let's get you back on your feet. Let's get you back on your feet.
Look at the state we're in, Deer.
In our homeland, we pay for our mercy.
...the sky goes in and out of the red...
I will condemn the jihad to those who suffer this persecution.

text: Benim hikâye böyle işte Kayı’nın yiğit Alpleri
english: That's my story. The mighty Alps of Kaiy.

text: Biz de Ertuğrul Bey’imizi kaybettikten sonra…

english: Let's just say we abandoned our cabin.

text: Yani siz de benim gibi yalnızsınız demek?
O vakit size bir teklifim vardır
english: Then I have a proposition for you.

text: Ben diyar diyar gezer mal taşırım
english: I travel from land to land. I carry goods.
I'll fight the bandit, the tyrant

text: Geçtiğim topraklar Moğollar yüzünden tarumar haldedir
english: The land I cross is torn apart by the Mongols.

text: …benim mallarımı koruyacak, helal süt emmiş, yiğit yoldaşlara ihtiyacım vardır
english: I need brave comrades who will protect my goods, who will suck milk.
Hmmm You want us to be your man
No, I'd like you to be my partner.

text: Mallarım her saldırıda azalır Birçoğunu kaybederim
english: I lose a lot of my goods in every attack.
But with you by my side...
...I'll be on my way without losing any of them.
That way, I'll get more money.
Instead of losing my goods to the bandit...
I'll share it with you, don't you think?
...we take our lives out into the open to be martyrs.

text: Ak akçe için ne can veririz…
english: What will we die for the white...
You put your lives against them.
And I'll make a profit on top.

text: Hem bu dünyada, hem öte dünyada kazanırsınız
english: You win in this world and in the next.

text: Sen bizi anlamazsın Boşuna laf tüketme
english: You don't understand us. Don't waste words.
If we fight for the accent...
...sucks our balls out and we'll be discouraged.
We've become friends Let's be friends
I was waiting for my father.
He said he'd be here soon.
Your father's in a bad mood, too.
Mama Hayme is good, she's nice

text: Lakin en az rahmetli kocası kadar inatçıdır
english: But she's as stubborn as her late husband.

text: İki boyun Alplerini de kumanda etmek…

english: ...if you want to show that you're a great warrior...
...you have to get along with him.

text: He tabii bir de Gökçe var
Eninde sonunda kızı döşeğine almak istersen…
english: If you want to get her on your mattress eventually...

text: …dizinin dibine oturup Allah’ın emriyle isteyeceğin kişi de o
english: He's the one you're going to sit at the bottom of your knee and ask for by the command of God.
I'll do my best for the sky

text: Lakin öteki mesele biraz daha karışık
english: But the other thing is a little more complicated.
What am I supposed to do?

text: Dilini de en az kılıcı kadar iyi kullanan bir delikanlısın
english: You're a young man who uses his tongue just as well as his sword.
When he looks at you, he'll see Ertugrul...
...the fat of your heart will melt.
I think you should do this right now.

text: Tuğtekin’le meselelerimizi birer birer hallediyoruz bey
english: We're sorting things out with Tugtekin, sir.

text: Haklı olsa da Alplerin sürgün edilmesine ses çıkarmaması var ya…
english: Even though he's right, the fact that he didn't make a sound about the exile of the Alps...

text: Kim olduğumuzu, nereden nereye geldiğimizi unutmayalım
english: Let's not forget who we are, where we come from, where we come from.

text: Kayılar artık eski şaşalı günlerinde değil
english: The recordings are no longer in their glory days.
The sun came up. My brother did the right thing.

text: Ertuğrul’un Alpleri kış bitince aramıza dönerler
english: The Alps of Ertugrul will return to us at the end of winter.

text: Gerçek er ya da geç ortaya çıkacaktır
english: The truth will come out sooner or later.

text: Hem Gündoğdu abimle sen karar vermemiş miydin ana…
english: Besides, it was dawn. Didn't you and my brother decide?

text: Aytolun’a da, Tuğtekin’e de dikkat edesin ana
english: Be careful of Aytolun, and watch out for Tugtekin.
They want to poison my master.
Like they wanted to poison my brother Gökçe.

text: Köpek’e söyle, Sultan Alaeddin’i Ögeday’a vergi vermesi için ikna etsin
english: Tell the dog to persuade Sultan Alaeddin to pay taxes on the person.

text: Yoksa bu topraklarda taş üstünde taş bırakmam
english: Or I'll leave no stone on this land

text: Sultan bunu kolay kolay kabul etmez

english: Here you go, Hamza. What do you mean?

text: Dediğim gibi. Eğer malları sağlam istiyorsa bu bedeli ödemeli
english: Like I said, if he wants the goods intact, he has to pay the price.
So that's what kept our Alps awake.

text: Benim, mallarımı ve canımı koruyacak yiğitlere ihtiyacım vardır
english: I need brave men to protect my goods and my life.

text: On bin baş koyundan daha kârlıdır
english: It's more profitable than 10,000 head sheep.
What do you mean there's no Abdurrahman?

text: Atını da, pusatını da alıp gitmiş
english: He's gone with his horse and his stroller.

text: Sabah gün doğmadan o tüccarla gitti dedi
english: He said he left with the merchant before sunrise.

text: O tüccarın eniği olmaya karar verdi demek
english: So he's decided to be the merchant's puppy.

text: Kayılardan artık kimseye hayır gelmez beyim
english: No good can come from the apricots, my lord.
Mr. Ertugrul was Oban's last hope.

text: O da öldükten sonra bitti artık
english: It's over after he's dead, too.
For as long as I can remember...
I served my Obama, Gündü Bey.
I've been to countless wars, I've come out.
I can't go back to Obama.

text: Sırf o Tuğtekin deyyusuna yaranmak için gözünü kırpmadan harcadı beni
english: He spent me in cold blood just to be guided by that Tugtekin's denominator.
Get your head in the game.
Wait for me at Han Hill
The merchant is a bit of a coward, Hamza.

text: Seni böyle görünce mallarına el koymaya geldim sanır
english: When he sees you like this, he thinks I'm here to confiscate your goods.
Is there a sign, Hayme Ana?
I thought about what happened last night.
I knew I was being impulsive, Hayme Ana.
I've lost a lot of men.
...I know that Hamza is a traitor.
If it hadn't been for my brother...
What about the Alps of Ertugrul?

text: Dağlarda başıboş gezen hergelelere döndüler hala
english: They're still a bunch of bastards wandering in the mountains.

text: Ertuğrul’un ölümünden sonra serseri olmaya hazırlar
english: After Ertugrul's death, they are ready to become outcasts
I'll never be able to control my Alps again.
We'll talk again when winter's over.
It's like I'm seeing my Ertugrul.
Do you have a sign, Hayme Ana?

text: Gökçe’yi istemiştin ama Keltepe’ye boş ay için ot toplamaya gitmişler
english: You wanted the sky, but they went to Keltepe to pick grass for the empty moon.
Okay, let my daughter come by and see me when she gets back.
First of all, our master is a martyr.
Then our obama was torn apart.

text: Şimdi de en yakın kardeşlerimiz hain oldu
english: Now our closest brothers are traitors
Tell me about it, Brother Abdurrahman.
I swear I don't know, Turgut.
We caught a Mongol. We got him talking.
We came to inform our master.
What a bitch these Mongols are!

text: Ertuğrul Bey’imiz olaydı şimdi bir hal çaresini bulurdu
english: Mr. Ertugrul would have found a way now.
We have to warn the Oba.

text: Belli ki başınıza bir iş gelmiş

english: Come on, I'll give you a bite.

text: Eksik olma Geyikli Biz böyle iyiyiz

english: Go on, get out of here.

text: Gelin, gelin Size bir hediyem de olacak
english: Come, come I have a gift for you
I was just passing by. I saw you.
I just wanted to make sure you were okay.
I feel like I'm walking around with my tongue in my mouth.
I don't know what to talk to you about.
What do you mean he got away?
What do you mean he ran away?

text: O halde seni öldürmekle başlayayım işe
english: Then I'll start by killing you.

text: Bütün Moğol ordusunu feda etmem gerekse de…
english: Even if I have to sacrifice the entire Mongolian army...
What if he tells you he's the spy from the Oba?
What if they find out where we are?
Big daddy's gonna take care of this.

text: Bana bak Tamut sana bir görev verdim
english: Listen, Tamut, I gave you an assignment.
I'll feed you to the dogs.
Hasn't he talked to the shroud in there yet?
He attacked me from behind. My master ran away.
Where is this lunatic taking us?
May Allah bring us to an end.
♪ It's dawn after me ♪ ♪ Finish him off ♪
